name: amigurumi spring chick
notes:
this is a free pattern on my blog!

i donâ€™t know about you but the start of a new season always has me itching to create spring themed amigurumi! these little chicks are the perfect addition to any collection and they're super cute and fun to crochet! these are so quick to make and the pattern includes step by step photos to help you along the way!


pattern difficulty: beginner

pattern is written in english, with us crochet terminology.

materials needed

worsted weight acrylic yarn
size e/3.5mm crochet hook
9mm plastic safety eyes 
polyester fiberfill stuffing 
stitch maker
yarn needle
scissors
straight pins
optional- 16 gauge black wire for the glasses

skills needed

magic ring
single crochet
increase
invisible decrease
chain
half double crochet
double crochet

finished measurement
2.5 inches wide and 3 inches tall
